snippet: The city’s newest form of public transportation is colliding with one of the city’s favorite pastimes: bar hopping.
abstract: Citi Bike, New York City's newest form of public transportation, is colliding with one of the city's favorite pastimes--bar hopping; while ridership peaks during the day, some New Yorkers are beginning to see it as a convenient way to explore the city's night life, even after a few cocktails; cycling under the influence is not illegal in New York City, but a drunk rider can be charged with disorderly conduct or reckless endangerment.
lead_paragraph: The city’s newest form of public transportation is colliding with one of the city’s favorite pastimes: bar hopping.

headline.main: Riding Away From a Bar Crawl With Citi Bikes
headline.print_headline: Riding Away From a Bar Crawl
